description: Allow Partner VPN to DMZ Web on HTTPS during work hours
nl_query: Allow Partner_VPN to access DMZ_Web_Server on HTTPS during Work_Hours

metadata.raw_policy: Allow Partner_VPN to access DMZ_Web_Server on HTTPS during Work_Hours

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from VPN
set rulebase security rules r1 to DMZ
set rulebase security rules r1 source Partner_VPN
set rulebase security rules r1 destination DMZ_Web_Server
set rulebase security rules r1 service application-default
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow
set rulebase security rules r1 schedule Work_Hours

description: Allow LAN Subnet to access Office Printers
expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from Inside
set rulebase security rules r1 to Inside
set rulebase security rules r1 source LAN_Subnet
set rulebase security rules r1 destination Office_Printers
set rulebase security rules r1 service application-default
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow

description: Allow Internet to DMZ Web Server on HTTP and HTTPS
nl_query: Allow Internet to access DMZ_Web_Server on HTTP

metadata.raw_policy: Allow Internet to access DMZ_Web_Server on HTTP

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from Outside
set rulebase security rules r1 to DMZ
set rulebase security rules r1 source Internet
set rulebase security rules r1 destination DMZ_Web_Server
set rulebase security rules r1 service tcp_80
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow
